Text.tooltip: +1 VP for each wooden or plastic token on map or in political assembly.
+x VP for each factory based on spectral exploitation value. (+2VP if war at end; x2 per if connected to Space Elevator.)
+1 VP for Colony on Astrobiology / +2 VP for Colony on Submarine or Bernal
+x VP faceup value on Glory chits. (M3: x2 if Loyalist V)
+x VP for dirtside hydration / +6 VP for Home Bernal.
+x VP for completed future listed on card.
+x VP according to final Active Law. (M3: x0 if Loyalist V or war continues/true / x1 if Independent V.)
+x VP for specific anchored/promoted bernals as listed on card.
+1 VP per bribe / x2 if truce/war continues / Loyalist V: x0 / Independent V: x1.
